definitions.definition: A group of people within hearing; specifically, a large gathering of people listening to or watching a performance, speech, etc.
definitions.example: We joined the audience just as the lights went down.

definitions.definition: Hearing; the condition or state of hearing or listening.
A widespread or nationwide viewing or listening public, as of a TV or radio network or program.
A formal meeting with a state or religious dignitary.
definitions.example: She managed to get an audience with the Pope.

definitions.definition: The readership of a book or other written publication.
definitions.example: "Private Eye" has a small but faithful audience.
The opera singer expanded his audience by singing songs from the shows.

definitions.definition: An audiencia (judicial court of the Spanish empire), or the territory administered by it.
